MasterCSS.tests package¶

Submodules¶

MasterCSS.tests.test_auth module¶

test_auth.py contains unit tests for authentication.

Route to route that doesn’t exist, renders the 404 template.

MasterCSS.tests.test_car_management module¶

test_car.py contains unit tests for car management. Tests related to controllers under /mangement/cars which is used to manage car entries in db.

MasterCSS.tests.test_car_management.test_add_car(client)¶

Test adding 2 cars into system to populate data.

Parameters

client (Flask app instance) – Flask app client

Parameters

client (Flask app instance) – Flask app client

test_fixture.py contains unit testing setup.
